name: Dungeon Girl
description: Dungeon Girl is a Puzzle RPG with over 1000 floors to conquer, and 300 items to craft. The fun never ends!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, or 10 Processor: Pentium 2.0GHz or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound compatible sound card
